title: Avacado 🥑 Milkshake 🥛 | Cold Beverage | Summer 🌞 Treats
content:
Cold Beverage: Avacado 🥑 Milkshake 🥛 Servings: 2 Duration: 5 mins Hi Everyone, I'm welcoming this summer by introducing healthy, frothy, smooth and delicious Avacado 🥑 Milkshake.   It's super simple to make just in minutes with out any efforts and it is in your hands. Ingredients are handy which are easily accessible in everyone's kitchen shelves 🙂have it any time in a day. This is one of my favorite Milkshake and I hope you all like / love ❤️Avacado 🥑🥑🥑🥑 I like to hear in comments, how many of you like/ love Avacado ? If anyone doesn't tasted it yet, my suggestion you must go for it ☺️ Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Ripened Avacado 🥑 - 1 - peeled off and chopped
  • Sugar - 2 tb sp
  • Honey - 1 tb sp
  • Milk - cold - 400 ml
  • Vanilla essence - 1/2 tsp
  • Ice cubes - 2
  • Chocolate chips - few - Garnish ( optional )
  • Green sugar - 1/2 tsp - garnish ( optional )
Procedure:
  • Add all ingredients in juicer ( except garnish ingredients )
  • Select Milkshake option
  • Blend till frothy and smooth
  • Adjust sweetness according to taste
  • Serve cold beverage in summer / at morning/ for kids at evening
  • Enjoy this summer with Milkshake , Happy cooking and have a good day 🙂
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Avacado is super healthy and your tummy definitely fills, if any one of you doesn't like avacado you can easily replace it with any other fruit such as banana/ Muskmelon or the fruit you like ☺️ Anything goes well
  • I added sugar and honey, if it's so sweet to you then use avoid one of it
  • Serve immediately
